Title: Audio Transcription and Lyric Verification
Description: Transcribed lyrics will appear here. You can write the lyrics if you want.
LandingDesc: Lyric Checker is an AI-powered application that detects plagiarism in song lyrics. Ensure the originality of your creative work and get recommendations to improve your lyrics.
PlagiarismDetectionDescription: Our AI-powered algorithm analyzes your lyrics and identifies any potential plagiarism.
EaseOfUseDescription: Our intuitive interface makes it easy to upload and analyze your lyrics. No technical expertise required.
LyricRecommendationsDescription: Receive personalized suggestions to improve your lyrics and make them more engaging.
TermsAndConditions: I accept the terms and conditions
RegisterMessage: The user has been successfully registered
LoginEmptyFields: All fields are required for logging in
ServerErrorLogin: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later
ChatPlaceHolder: What do you want to ask about your lyrics?
ChatFirstBot: Hello! What else do you want to find out about the suggestion I gave you?
ModalRes: Which option do you prefer to receive more feedback about it?
ModalSugg: If you want suggestions for changing the letter, click
Tooltip3: Only 60 seconds will be transcribed. It is recommended to choose the most memorable minute
InputLabel: Select the language of the audio
FeedbackTitle: We'd love to hear what went well or how we can improve the product experience.
